summary: An Ordinance annulling and repealing Ordinance No. 13199, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Five (5), of Randell's Addition to the City of Seattle, from East Union Street to East Spring Street, by grading the same, in accordance with Majority Petition, File No. 28968, in the office of the City Comptroller of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said City, approved December 6, 1899, and authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to cancel any contract let in pursuance of said ordinance; and authorizing the City Comptroller to withdraw the assessment roll, heretofor filed in conformity with said ordinance.
